about_the_game:
Travel to Novantica City in the year 2124 to guide young college student Aries on an unforgettable journey and venture beyond the boundaries of time itself.

In a city influenced by powerful AI systems, corrupt power brokers, and clandestine organizations, Aries is caught in the middle of a mysterious event that has sent shockwaves throughout vital infrastructure. Collect parts and build high tech devices to solve puzzles, repair damaged systems, and investigate a nefarious plot.

Navigate the open streets on foot, pedal through urban canyons on bike, glide on hovering trams and trains, and carve around crowds on hoverboard, discovering hidden treasures and uncovering clues to piece together a mystery.

Meet new people, make friends, repair bots, and help your fellow citizens to explore the city of Novantica.

Features


  • Explore an open-world urban environment filled with high tech devices and a unique alternative history
  • Investigate a mysterious event and try to stop a dangerous, evil plan from unfolding
  • Travel back in time to conduct research for school
  • Collect parts and craft devices to help you solve puzzles and repair broken systems
  • Help your fellow citizens and make new friends
  • Leverage powerful AI systems to gather data
  • Collect mysterious artifacts and hidden treasures

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended

short_description: Explore the open-world, futuristic city of Novantica in this sci-fi adventure game, traveling back in time, crafting devices, gathering clues, and solving puzzles to untangle the plot behind a mysterious event that has damaged critical systems across the city.
